SELECT member_weight_id, member_count, weight FROM member_weights ORDER BY member_count ASC
SELECT a.item_id, c.npc_id FROM loots a INNER JOIN items b ON a.item_id = b.id AND b.loot_quest_id > 0 INNER JOIN loot_pack_dropping_npcs c ON a.loot_pack_id = c.loot_pack_id
SELECT slot_type_id, coverage FROM wearable_slots
SELECT id FROM item_grades ORDER BY grade_order ASC
SELECT COUNT(*), MAX(id), SUM(bytes) FROM allowed_name_chars WHERE provider_type_id = ?
SELECT char, bytes FROM allowed_name_chars WHERE provider_type_id = ?

SELECT id, name, up_limit, expert_limit, advantage, cast_adv, color_argb, gauge_color, up_currency_id, up_price, down_currency_id, down_price, show, exp_mul, use_intensified, use_language_type FROM expert_limits ORDER BY up_limit ASC
SELECT step, note_length FROM music_note_limits ORDER BY step ASC
SELECT expand_count, life_point, item_id, item_count FROM expand_expert_limits ORDER BY expand_count ASC
SELECT expert_limit_id, actability_view_group_id, count FROM intensified_expert_limits ORDER BY expert_limit_id ASC
SELECT id, kind_id, actual_id, tooltip_msg FROM ucc_applicables
SELECT id, fail_break, cost_ratio FROM item_socket_chances
SELECT npc_id, specialty_bundle_id, zone_group_id FROM specialty_npcs
SELECT item_id FROM item_cap_scale_forbids
SELECT item_id, level FROM item_socket_level_limits
SELECT slot_id, grade_id, num_socket FROM item_socket_num_limits
SELECT world_id, config_id, value, provider_type_id FROM world_specific_content_configs
SELECT id, kind_id, value1, value2 FROM char_records
select *from grammar_tags where tagid = 1
select *from grammar_tags where tagid = 2
select *from grammar_tags where tagid = 3
select *from grammar_tags where tagid = 4

SELECT d.npc_id, c.item_id FROM mate_equip_pack_groups AS d INNER JOIN (SELECT a.id AS id, b.item_id AS item_id FROM mate_equip_packs a INNER JOIN mate_equip_pack_items b ON a.id = b.mate_equip_pack_id) AS c ON d.mate_equip_pack_id = c.id
SELECT id, item_impl_id, item_enchant_ratio_kind_id FROM item_enchant_ratio_groups

SELECT item_enchant_ratio_group_id, grade, grade_enchant_success_ratio, grade_enchant_great_success_ratio,grade_enchant_break_ratio, grade_enchant_downgrade_ratio, grade_enchant_cost, grade_enchant_downgrade_min, grade_enchant_downgrade_max, currency_id, grade_enchant_disable_ratio FROM item_enchant_ratios
SELECT item_enchant_ratio_group_id, item_id FROM item_enchant_ratio_items
select item_guide_id, item_id, item_guide_a_category_id, item_guide_b_category_id, show_craft from item_guide_elems ORDER BY item_guide_id, visible_order
select name, detail from ui_permissions
select id, loot_pack_id, active from gacha_loot_packs
select gacha_loot_pack_id, kind, item_id from gacha_loot_pack_items
SELECT group_type, rank, item_id, count, item_grade_id FROM resident_rewards ORDER BY group_type, rank
SELECT id, ability_id, recommend_ability_id, recommend_ability_category_id FROM recommend_abilities
SELECT id, day_of_week_id, ed_day, ed_hour, ed_min, ed_month, ed_year, end_time, end_time_min, st_day, st_hour, st_min, st_month, st_year, start_time, start_time_min FROM game_schedules

SELECT id, broadcast_event_to_whole_seamless_world, color_end, color_progress, color_start, end_msg, first_wave_after, force_end_time, icon_key, kill_npc_count, kill_npc_id, operation_time_limit, start_day_of_week_bit, start_hour, start_minute, start_msg, target_npc_spawner_id, title_msg, tod, tod_day_interval, ref_zone_waiting, name, start_hour1, start_minute1, start_hour2, start_minute2, start_hour3, start_minute3, start_hour4, start_minute4, start_hour5, start_minute5, start_hour6, start_minute6, map_icon_path, map_icon_key, map_icon_tooltip, hud_icon_path, hud_icon_key, hud_icon_tooltip, sync_step_use, sound_pack_id FROM tower_defs

SELECT id, title, description, st_year, st_month, st_day, st_hour, st_min, ed_year, ed_month, ed_day, ed_hour, ed_min, item_id, item_num, st_display_hour, st_display_min, ed_display_hour, ed_display_min FROM survey_forms
